'''''A to Z of Tolkien''''' is an encyclopedia-style book written by David Day, first published in [[1993]].

The book has been re-packaged and published under many different titles, including:
* '''''The Tolkien Companion''''' (1993)
* '''''A Guide to Tolkien''''' (2001)
* '''''Tolkien: A Dictionary''''' (2013)
* '''''A Dictionary of Tolkien''''' (2013)

''A Dictionary of Tolkien'' later became the first installment of "The World of Tolkien" set.
